title: What was the number 1 song in November 1995? - Quora

response.answer_text: The song was “Fantasy” by Mariah Carey. It was written by Carey and Dave Hall, and was produced by them and Sean Combs. “Fantasy” was from Carey’s fifth studio album, “Daydream”, which was released on Sept 12, 1995. “Fantasy” was the second song in Billboard history (and the first by a female), to debut #1 on the Billboard Hot 100, and stayed on top for eight consecutive weeks.
